frontMatter.title: Slice array element
frontMatter.description: Write a programme to generate new array with sliced elements of old array

contentHtml:
Write a programme to generate new array with sliced elements of old array

Array : ['abcd', 'efgh', 'ijklmn', 'opq', 'rstuvw', 'xyz']
Start : 2
End   : 3

Sliced Array : ['bc', 'fg', 'jk', 'pq', 'st', 'yz']
markdown:
## Write a programme to generate new array with sliced elements of old array

```txt
Array : ['abcd', 'efgh', 'ijklmn', 'opq', 'rstuvw', 'xyz']
Start : 2
End   : 3

Sliced Array : ['bc', 'fg', 'jk', 'pq', 'st', 'yz']
```

---
